p:
We follow the derivations in Huang et al. ( 20) to calculate the values of R
I for the simulations with heterogenous infection rate. First, we calculate the probability that a susceptible cell become infected when it is connected to an infected cell in the infection layer. Because infected cells die after a fixed period of time τ = 1 day in the simulation, this probability can be calculated as ζ = 1 − e −βτ = 1 − e β, whose mean,
ζ
¯
,
is given by:
